page.title: 10MILTON HELPS OTHERS.
page.content: We try to have a social concern for people less fortunate than ourselves, at home and abroad.Milton school gives money to Third World Countries and helps the village and also handicapped children.We gave each village{old age} {pensioner}a plant and also a card at Easter.They are always invited to our Harvest,Easter and Summer services and we give a special concert for them at Christmas.We ask them to our Burns Day Concert in January and coffee morning in June.{Mentally handicapped}children come from Glenrothes to our Christmas Concert,then we do it for{patients}in Randolph Wemyss Hospital.After fund raising, we gave Â£56.38 to the{United} {Nations Children's Fund.}We also donated Â£12.70 to the{Malcolm Sargent {Cancer Fund for Children,}and our donations to{Barnardo's}were Â£112.
